TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ActionClickEventHandler(object sender, ActionEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ActionClickEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将要处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序会显示包含识别的智能标记词或表达式的单元格的地址。The event handler displays the address of the cell that contains the recognized smart tag term or expression. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#4)]
